name: RadiologyToHeadAndSinus
title: Radiology to Head and Sinus
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Radiology to Head and Sinus that is not appropriate for ordering during an evaluation for allergic rhinitis),(Data Element Scope: Procedure, Performed),(Inclusion Criteria: CT + MRI + Plain films of mid face),(Exclusion Criteria: mandible, orbit, skull, head)
